templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[merchant_id]" value="{$profile.options.merchant_id}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_xsolla_merchant_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[api_key]" value="{$profile.options.api_key}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_xsolla_api_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[project_id]" value="{$profile.options.project_id}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_xsolla_project_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[secret_key]" value="{$profile.options.secret_key}" label="{{ phrase('wh1_xsolla_secret_key') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}"> </xf:textboxrow>
